  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.notification.NotificationImpl

    public class NotificationImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Notification
    Notification implementation for Core API.

      • create

        public static NotificationImpl create(@NonNull java.lang.Throwable error,
                                      @Nullable java.lang.Object message)
        Create a notification from an error.
        Parameters:
        error - the error.
        message - optional message. Usually this is text or a TextSource. If the message appears to be formatted with an argument, the message will be used as a formatter argument.
        Returns:
        the notification.
